articles.author: BASSEM MROUE
articles.description: BEIRUT, Lebanon (AP) — The death toll from an Israeli airstrike on a Beirut suburb rose to 31, including seven women and three children, Lebanon's health minister said on Saturday, as Israel and Hezbollah traded fire.
articles.title: Death toll from Israeli airstrike on Beirut suburb rises to 31 as Israel and Hezbollah trade fire

articles.author: DAN MERICA, GARANCE BURKE and ALI SWENSON
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — With the 2024 election looming, the first since the mass popularization of generative artificial intelligence, experts feared the worst: social media flooded with AI-generated deepfakes that were so realistic, baffled voters wouldn’t know what to believe.
articles.title: AI is helping shape the 2024 presidential race. But not in the way experts feared

articles.author: MEG KINNARD and ERIK VERDUZCO
articles.description: WILMINGTON, N.C. (AP) — Donald Trump returns to North Carolina on Saturday, stumping in the southern battleground state that both Democrats and Republicans are treating as increasingly critical to victory in November.
articles.title: Donald Trump returns to North Carolina without Mark Robinson, one of his top in-state supporters

articles.author: SEJAL GOVINDARAO
articles.description: PHOENIX (AP) — The Arizona Supreme Court unanimously ruled Friday that nearly 98,000 people whose citizenship documents hadn’t been confirmed can vote in state and local races, a significant decision that could influence ballot measures and tight legislative races.
articles.title: Court rules nearly 98,000 Arizonans whose citizenship hadn't been confirmed can vote the full ballot

articles.author: GABRIEL SANDOVAL
articles.description: PHOENIX (AP) — Voters will decide ballot measures on abortion and immigration in Arizona, a key battleground state where Republicans are looking to capitalize on concerns about illegal border crossings to counter an expected increase in turnout by people determined to restore and protect abortion rights.
articles.title: With immigration and abortion on Arizona's ballot, Republicans are betting on momentum

articles.author: ELLEN KNICKMEYER and MATTHEW LEE
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Biden administration is taking a more hands-off approach than usual during a week of dramatic escalation between Israel and Hezbollah militants in Lebanon, with top U.S.
articles.title: The US is more hands-off than usual in the Middle East. It fears making things worse

articles.author: DIANE JEANTET
articles.description: AVIGNON, France (AP) — The trial of dozens of men accused of raping an unconscious woman whose husband repeatedly drugged her over the course of nearly a decade has highlighted the difficulties that sexual violence victims can face in France.
articles.title: Shocking rape trial highlights the systematic struggles French sexual abuse victims face

articles.author: KRISHAN FRANCIS, SHEIKH SAALIQ and BHARATHA MALLAWARACHI
articles.description: COLOMBO, Sri Lanka (AP) — Voting has ended Saturday in Sri Lanka's presidential election as the country seeks to recover from the worst economic crisis in its history and the resulting political upheaval.
articles.title: Voting ends in Sri Lanka to choose a president and a way out of years of turmoil

articles.author: MARI YAMAGUCHI
articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — Heavy rain pounded Japan’s northcentral region of Noto on Saturday which triggered landslides and floods and left one person dead and several missing, officials said.The deluges caused swollen rivers to overflow, flooding homes and stranding some residents in the region still recovering from the deadly Jan.
articles.title: Heavy rain pounds northcentral Japan leaving 1 person dead and several others missing

articles.author: MIKE FITZPATRICK
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — After the Philadelphia Phillies clinched a third consecutive playoff appearance Friday night, they shook hands on the field and walked back toward the dugout as though it were any other regular-season victory.
articles.title: Phillies clinch 3rd straight playoff berth and close in on NL East title
